means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 金特尔绰号，来源于中世纪英语及古法语，含义是“出身名门的，高贵的，有礼貌的”(wellborn,noble,courteous)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含有"温和的，柔和的"之意。
means: gentle ： 指温柔、亲切、优雅。常含有节制和意味。
mild ： 用于人时，指天性温顺，脾气好，不放肆粗野；用于物时，主要指适度，程度上相当缓和给人以愉快感觉。
soft ： 侧重柔软或安稳、光滑，使人不感到粗糙或严酷。
tender和gentle意思很接近。指人的感情细腻、温情慈爱和有同情心，侧重心理素质。也可指物的柔嫩等。
moderate ： 中性词，指温和稳健，有节制，不走极端。

sentence.Network_en: The blustery winds of spring had dropped to a gentle breeze.
sentence.Network_cn: 呼啸的春风已经减弱，成了习习的微风。

sentence.Network_en: Place the omelette under a gentle grill until the top is set.
sentence.Network_cn: 将煎蛋饼放在烤架下用文火烘烤，直到表面凝固。

sentence.Network_en: It was too hot even for a gentle stroll.
sentence.Network_cn: 天太热，连慢慢散步都吃不消。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 阅读短文，回答问题_百度知道 ... 温驯[ tame] 温雅[ gentle] 奔突[ rush about;barge about;madly dash around].
九年级英语单词表 ... lyric 歌词 gentle 温和的 dislike 嫌恶.
形容人性格的词汇 ... genteel 有教养的； gentle 有礼貌的 humorous 有幽默；.
柔字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 柔软〖 lithe;soft;flexible;supple〗 柔和;温和〖 mild;gentle〗 温柔〖 gentleandsoft〗.

list.abs: 有关风的英文单词_百度知道 ... whole gale 10 级风 gentle wind 和风 windy and dusty 风沙.
口译还是得留点东西的 ... 68.中火 medium 69.小，微，文火 gentle heat 70.煎 pan-fry.
缓_百度百科 ... 走路缓慢的人[ laggard;delayed;tardy] 缓坡[ gentle slope] 缓气[ get a breathing space;take a breather].
风的级数是怎样衡量的？_百度知道 ... 轻风 slight breeze 微风 gentle breeze 和风 moderate breeze.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French gentil 'high-born, noble', from Latin gentilis 'of the same clan' (see gentle). The original sense was 'nobly born', hence 'courteous, chivalrous', later 'mild, moderate in action or disposition' (mid 16th cent.)
late 16th cent.: probably from an obsolete sense of the adjective, 'soft, pliant'

entry.def: Someone who is gentle is kind, mild, and calm.

example.ex: My son was a quiet and gentle man who liked sports and enjoyed life...
example.tran: 我儿子是个安静温和的人，喜欢运动和享受生活。

example.ex: Michael's voice was gentle and consoling.
example.tran: 迈克尔的嗓音轻柔而且抚慰人心。

entry.def: Gentle actions or movements are performed in a calm and controlled manner, with little force.

example.ex: His movements were gentle and deliberate.

entry.tran: （天气）温和的； （尤指风）和煦的，微弱的
entry.def: If you describe the weather, especially the wind, as gentle, you mean it is pleasant and calm and not harsh or violent.

example.ex: The blustery winds of spring had dropped to a gentle breeze.
example.tran: 呼啸的春风已经减弱，成了习习的微风。

entry.def: A gentle slope or curve is not steep or severe.

example.ex: There were two passes over 13,000 feet but the slopes were gentle.
example.tran: 有两个超过13,000英尺的山口，但坡度平缓。

entry.def: A gentle heat is a fairly low heat.

example.ex: Cook for 30 minutes over a gentle heat.

means.word_mean: 1. cause to be more favorably inclined; gain the good will of;

sentences.sentence: "She managed to mollify the angry customer"

means.word_mean: 2. give a title to someone; make someone a member of the nobility
1. soft and mild; not harsh or stern or severe;
2. having or showing a kindly or tender nature;
4. belonging to or characteristic of the nobility or aristocracy;

sentences.sentence: "a gentle old horse, docile and obedient"
"a soft (or light) tapping at the window"

means.word_mean: 温和的, 和蔼的, 有礼貌的

sentences.en: Our new teacher is gentle towards us.
sentences.cn: 我们的新老师对我们很和蔼。

means.word_mean: 轻的, 柔和的; 和缓的

sentences.en: We ran down the hill along the gentle slope.
sentences.cn: 我们顺着和缓的斜坡跑下山。

sentences.en: You must be gentle when holding a little baby.

means.word_mean: 高尚的; 出身名门的

sentences.en: He was a person of gentle blood.

jushi.english: The gentle rolling motion of the ship made me feel sleep.
jushi.chinese: 船只轻微的摇动催我入睡。

jushi.english: A gentle rain dropped yesterday morning.
jushi.chinese: 昨天上午下了一场小雨。
